entries.meaning:
(mathematics, rare) An analogue of the square or cube in arbitrary dimension: 
  
    
      
        {
        0
        ,
        1
        
          }
          
            n
          
        
      
    
    {\displaystyle \{0,1\}^{n}}
  
 along with the 
  
    
      
        (
        n
        −
        1
        )
      
    
    {\displaystyle (n-1)}
  
-dimensional balls joining every 
  
    
      
        
          2
          
            n
            −
            1
          
        
      
    
    {\displaystyle 2^{n-1}}
  
 such points that share a coordinate, or any space equivalent.
